title: Smart Data models - Pen schema
description: Fenced area in a building or department or outside housing a group of animals. Animals in a pen can move and interact freely. Pens are often not completely separated from each other (half walls, iron bars, fences,…), making it possible that animals from neighbouring pens can see/touch

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. it has to be Pen

additionalInfo.description: Property. list of all the raw values sent by the sensor/platform with all the possible extra properties that are not included in the main structure. It is a JSON structure similar to this: {'name': 'temperature', 'value' : 32}

arrivalTimestamp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date and Time for the arrival of animals to the Pen

avgGrowth.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The average growth in weight of the animal in this pen

avgWeight.description: Property. Units:'Kg'. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The average weight of the animal in this Pen.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier with format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity.

buildingId.description: Relationship. Unique identifier of the Building the item is located in. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'.

co2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The CO2 concentration in the item

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

companyId.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Unique identifier of a company

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

compartmentId.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Unique identifier of the Compartment the Pen is located in.

deadAnimalsSinceDateOfArrival.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Number of dead animals since the date of arrival

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

farmId.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Unique identifier of the Farm the Pen is located in.

feedConsumption.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The total amount of food that has been eaten from the feeding station(s) in the pen.It is measured through feed intakes and specific structure to let only one animal at a time to eat. Units:'Kg'

humidity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Quantity representing the amount of water vapour in the atmosphere in the pen.

lastUpdate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date and time at which the measurements in the item were taken. Units:'Seconds'

luminosity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The brightness of a light source of a certain wavelength at the item. Units:'LUX'

numAnimals.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Number of animals contained in the Pen.

sex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The sex of the animals contained in the pen

temperature.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temperature of the Pen.  Unirs:' Celsius degree'

waterConsumption.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The total amount of water that came out from the tap or taps in the pen. It is measured through flowmeters and specific structure to let only one animal at a time drink.

weightStDev.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The standard deviation associated to the average weight of the animals contained in the Pen.
